text: Victoria Eugenia Villarruel (born 13 April 1975) is an Argentine politician, lawyer, and activist who is the 38th and current Vice President of Argentina since 2023. She is the founder and president of a civil association called the Center for Legal Studies on Terrorism. She was a member of the Argentine Chamber of Deputies from 2021 to 2023. Villarruel successfully ran as the running mate of Javier Milei in the 2023 general election. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine lawyers Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires Category:Vice presidents of Argentina
title: Victoria Villarruel
